description: A well marked trail to the top of Piper Mountain for great views and then a moderately well marked trail to the summit of Whiteface Mountain.Park at the gate in winter and follow the red trail to the top of Piper and then the green trail to Whiteface.  In summer you can travel up the autoroad to park.  Follow the road back down hill until you come to the white trail.  The trail will split then follow the trail to the right to Piper's Summit.
directions: US 3 to 11A in Gilford. Head northeast and then right onto Belknap Mountain Road, follow for just over 2 miles and then go left on Carriage Road  The gate closes at 6pm in summer and is closed in winter.
title: Piper MT to Whiteface MT
